Package com.dungeon.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.dungeon.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attackable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Gold, Player, Projectile
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Attackable
An abstract class defining an Entity

      public boolean hit​(int damage)
      Deal damage to this entity, update health bar, and show damage particle. If health reaches 0, kill this entity.
      Specified by:
